meanings.definition: The state or quality of being messy or untidy.
meanings.sent1: Her room was filled with mussiness, with clothes scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen's mussiness made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent3: Despite the mussiness of his desk, he always knew where everything was.
meanings.sent4: The mussiness of the garden resembled a wild jungle.
meanings.sent5: The mussiness of the paint splatters created a unique artwork on the floor.

meanings.sent1: She tried to fix her mussiness before going out.
meanings.sent2: His mussiness made him look like he just woke up.
meanings.sent3: The mussiness of her hair added a touch of charm to her look.
meanings.sent4: The mussiness of his clothes gave him a carefree vibe.
meanings.sent5: The mussiness of the room reflected his chaotic personality.
